review: Enjoying the fire stick better than roku so far. However I have noticed that it's glitching lately. But overall I'm happy with it. Had it for three months now
author: Virginia Heckard

review: Our first 'high tech" device for TV. Easy to use. We are still learning all the benefits. Maybe we can skip cable.
author: HAPPYCHIK777 "Cheryl F."

review: amazing! if you already have an account, it's already set up. you literally plug and play.
author: S.L. Koger

review: Awesome! It will be even better once Amazon natively includes the Firefox or Google Chrome browser. I had to install the Firefox browser in order to use my Fire Stick on a hotel's wifi. Not the easiest task but doable.
author: Jerome Murray

review: Worked Great to start with.Long Time Customer
author: Matthew M Miller

review: Great tool for your TV and very inexpensive.
author: Florida Jo

review: Works ok. Glitches at least 8 times per half hour show.  Frustrating.  And thought with my amazon prime I would try out amazon tv.  They charged me after a week and I didn't use it since there is a charge to watch each tv show of at least 2.99!Disappointed
author: Melanie B.

review: Love this! Easy set up and easy to use. Even my husband who wasn't so sure about this is liking it.
author: juicypez

review: Fire TV Stick is Awesome! It's so easy to hook up to your TV and the streaming of what ever you want to watch is great! Also with Prime you get tons of Free shows, movies, and games, You Tube and Etc. Why would you need anything else? This is It! Very happy With Fire TV Stick! I would recommend this to anyone!
author: AUGDOG
